prompt: Chiikawastyle,Chiikawa,This is a digital drawing of Chiikawa, a cute, round, white, fluffy character with large, expressive eyes and pink blush marks on their cheeks. Chiikawa has a small, smiling mouth and two tiny ears on top of their head. The background is a solid, pastel pink color. Chiikawa's design is simplistic and cartoonish, with thick black outlines and minimal shading. The character appears to be floating or suspended in the air, with a green, leaf-like shape above their head. The overall style is reminiscent of Japanese kawaii (cute) art, with a focus on simplicity and cuteness.
